title: Multimodal Text Processing System: An Integrated Approach
description: This project implements a pipeline for processing long-form audio and integrating multiple NLP tasks, including speech-to-text transcription using OpenAI's Whisper, text summarization with Facebook's BART, and text classification. The system also performs named entity recognition using a custom LSTM-CRF model, with detailed evaluations on transcription accuracy and summarization quality.

title: Personal App
description: Personal App is a comprehensive application that integrates various functionalities including note-taking, event management, weather updates, and timezone tracking. This project demonstrates the use of modern technologies like React, Auth0 for authentication, Prisma as an ORM for database operations, and Express for server-side logic.

title: Number Guesser Neural Network
description: A neural network project using TensorFlow to recognize hand-drawn digits. The model is trained on the MNIST dataset and integrated with an interactive interface built with Pygame and/or Tkinter, allowing users to draw digits (0â€“9) and get predictions.

title: Twitter Favorite Bot
description: A simple Twitter bot built with Node.js that returns 10 tweets for a specified search query and automatically favorites each tweet.
